short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ScribeCount is a robust tool crafted for indie authors and publishers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ScribeCount is a comprehensive author services platform designed specifically for indie authors and publishers, offering an extensive suite of tools to streamline and enhance your writing business. Whether you're tracking royalties and profits across various platforms and marketplaces, monitoring ad performance, managing social media, or analyzing marketing data, ScribeCount brings all these functions together in a single, user-friendly interface.

No more juggling between multiple websites to gather critical information for your business decisions. ScribeCount allows you to monitor sales by platform, pen name, series, format, and more—all in real time. With its integrated browser extension, data from multiple platforms is automatically captured, providing you with up-to-date insights at your fingertips.

ScribeCount gives you instant access to your data from any device connected to the internet, helping you save time, reduce costs, and focus on your core passion—writing. With a simple click, identify what's working and what needs tweaking, making it easier than ever to thrive as an indie author.

ScribeCount—Transforming your words into actionable data. Spend less time managing your business and more time growing it. Write your next bestseller with confidence, knowing that ScribeCount has everything else covered.
